mapper.select: SELECT cr.id, cr.recover_interest, cr.recover_account, cr.recover_capital, cc.coupon_type, cu.coupon_user_code FROM ht_coupon_recover cr INNER JOIN ht_coupon_tender ct ON cr.tender_id = ct.order_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user cu ON ct.coupon_grant_id = cu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config cc ON cu.coupon_code = cc.coupon_code WHERE cr.tender_id = #{tenderNid} AND cr.recover_period = #{periodNow} AND cr.recover_status = 0 AND cr.received_flg = 1 AND cr.del_flag = 0 AND ct.del_flag = 0 AND cu.del_flag = 0 AND cc.del_flag = 0

SELECT cr.id, cr.recover_account, cr.recover_capital, cr.recover_interest, cu.coupon_user_code, cc.coupon_type FROM ht_coupon_recover cr INNER JOIN ht_coupon_tender ct ON cr.tender_id = ct.order_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user cu ON ct.coupon_grant_id = cu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config cc ON cu.coupon_code = cc.coupon_code WHERE cr.tender_id = #{tenderNid} AND cr.recover_period = #{periodNow} AND cr.recover_status = 0 AND cr.received_flg = 4 AND cr.del_flag = 0 AND ct.del_flag = 0 AND cu.del_flag = 0 AND cc.del_flag = 0

SELECT cr.id, cr.tender_id, cr.recover_interest, cr.recover_period, bt.borrow_nid, b.addip, cr.update_time FROM ht_coupon_recover cr INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn bt ON bt.nid = cr.tender_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid WHERE bt.user_id = #{userId} AND cr.recover_status = 1 AND cr.received_flg = 2 AND cr.del_flag = 0

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(cr.recover_account,0)) AS recover_interest FROM ht_coupon_recover cr INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn bt ON bt.nid = cr.tender_id WHERE bt.user_id = #{userId} AND bt.tender_type = 1 AND (cr.received_flg = 1 OR cr.received_flg = 2 OR cr.received_flg = 4) AND cr.del_flag = 0

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(cr.recover_interest_yes,0) + IFNULL(cr.recover_capital_yes,0)) AS recover_interest FROM ht_coupon_recover cr INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn bt ON bt.nid = cr.tender_id WHERE bt.user_id = #{userId} AND bt.tender_type = 1 AND cr.recover_status = 1 AND cr.received_flg = 5 AND cr.del_flag = 0

SELECT t.recover_time, SUM( IFNULL(t.recover_interest, 0) ) AS interest_sum FROM ( SELECT hcr.recover_interest, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) recover_time FROM ht_coupon_recover hcr INNER JOIN ht_coupon_tender ct ON hcr.tender_id = ct.order_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user cu ON ct.coupon_grant_id = cu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config cc ON cu.coupon_code = cc.coupon_code WHERE hcr.del_flag = 0 AND cc.coupon_type = 2 AND hcr.recover_time >= #{timeStart} AND hcr.recover_time < #{timeEnd} ORDER BY hcr.recover_time ASC ) t GROUP BY t.recover_time;

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(hcr.recover_interest_yes,0)) AS interest_sum_yes FROM ht_coupon_recover hcr INNER JOIN ht_coupon_tender ct ON hcr.tender_id = ct.order_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user cu ON ct.coupon_grant_id = cu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config cc ON cu.coupon_code = cc.coupon_code WHERE hcr.del_flag = 0 AND cc.coupon_type = 2 AND FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.recover_yestime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = FROM_UNIXTIME( unix_timestamp(now()), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND hcr.recover_status = 1
